reviewText: This was the one that started it all.  In this tape is the first episode of the long running Martial Arts-Comedy Ranma .  It's extremely funny and it introduces the main story that is Ranma and of course some of that great smart mouth comedy.In the first episode, Soun Tendo tells his 3 daughters that his old friend, Genma Soatome and his son Ranma, will be coming to stay with them.  When they are supposed to show up, instead of a man and his son showing up, a PANDA carrying a GIRL shows up at their door step.  The Tendo girls, Kasumi, Nabiki and Akane, then asume that Ranma is a girl and not a boy.  After a bath, the Tendo's find out that the Panda and the girl are INDEED Genma and Ranma!  Genma then tells them about their dreadful journey to the Chinese training ground called Jusenkyo and how the waters of Jusenkyo can turn whoever falls into them whatever drowned there many years ago.In episode 2, it's Ranma's first day at his new high school with Akane and Nabiki.  And right off the bat, he meets Furinkan High School's greatest champion (and biggest pervert) Tatewaki Kuno.  Kuno takes issue with Ranma because he's being too familiar with Akane and challenges Ranma to a fight.  Now Ranma has to put Kuno in his place and Kuno has to beat Ranma and show him that he is the Blue Thunder of Furinkan.  Ranma also finds out why Akane hates boys so much!In my opinion, the first TV series is one of the best in the entire Ranma catalogue.  Tape 1 has a lot of great laughs and some really funny lines in it as well.  Like this hilarious exchange between Ranma and Akane..."Me? Marry that pervert? Never!" "Hey wait a minute, what do you mean pervert?!"If you're a new fan of the series, check out the entire First TV season and make sure you start with Tape/DVD 1.  You won't be disappointed!  Just remember that there are 2 different tapes, one is in English and the other is in Japanese language/English subtitles.
Title: N/A

reviewText: In this first episode to one of the most hilarious animated series ever created, we get introduced to Ranma, Akane, Genma, Soun, Nabiki, and the loveable Kasumi. Here in this episode we see Ranma and Akane meet for the  first time as Ranma's transformation secret is exposed. To make matters  worse the two are being forced to get married against their will because  their fathers arranged it.  In the second episode we get introduced to  one of the funniest characters in the series Tatewaki "Blue  thunder" Kuno age 17. Tatewaki happens to be in love with Akane and  refuses to accept Ranmas engagement to her.  This is the founding volume  for the entire Ranma 1/2 anime series. This is a must have for any serious  collector of Ranma 1/2. There is some nudity in this tape but no real  questionable content.

reviewText: Buy this video to see how it all began. It's a truly great video for any fan of Ranma, or just a fan of anime! You won't regret it when you watch this! it's truly wonderful!

reviewText: This is seriously the best anime series of all time and one of the best series ever made. It's funny as hell, and it's about a boy (Ranma) and a girl (Akane) who get promised for marriage, but they don't like each other. And whenever cold water is poured on Ranma, he becomes a girl. Hilarious.

reviewText: I really didn't know what to think about this anime when I heard of it from a friend. Come on would you want to watch a guy turn into a girl just by getting wet with hot water? Well I did, she told me how funny it was. So I was like ok but I had to buy the whole series, cause if I did like it i would like to see the whole series. Well you can tell I love the first tape. It made me laugh so hard. It is truly a beautiful series. After I watched the first series I bought the rest of the seasons series. The first one is the TV series, 2nd series is Anything Goes Martial Arts, 3rd series is Hard battle, 4th series Outta Control the OVA series (the reason why I put this after the 4th series is you should watch the OVAs after you watch the 4th series and watch the movies too, 5th Martial Mayham, 6th series is Random Rhapsody, 7th and final series Ranma Forever I started to collect, and the 2 movies but I have not yet watch them. I just watched the first series I'm trying to find some more time to watch the 2nd series.Anyways I'll talk about this first tape. Ranma's old man sets him up to marry, but he rejects. So the family that has 3 daughters end up finding out about Ranma and his old man little curse. Ranma and Akane are not really getting along. I really like the part when she hits him with the table. But there is so much more than that part ever single minute is so good. I'm like so hooked. Another reason why I started watching this anime is also because I seen Inu Yasha and it is a beautiful art romantis fairy tale alittle bit of comdey but not as much as Ranma 1/2. But it is a great anime in it's own why. This writer totally is the best.Well that's it for now.RANMA SO RULES OF ROMANTIC COMDEYS OF ANIME.
